S.FORM: Zihing u sulit nu Hulam: i Taoyuan a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Zihing. u kasalumaluma' nu Zihing sa, 76 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 256 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 242 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95 . u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 14 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5 . u kasabinacadan, Tayal 91 , Amis 1 , zumazuma 1 . Zihing u sulit nu Hulam: i Taoyuan a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Zihing. u kasalumaluma' nu Zihing sa, 79 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 246 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 230 ku tademaw, pakalatu 93 . u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 16 ku tademaw, pakalatu 7 . u kasabinacadan, Tayal 90 , Bunun 1 , zumazuma 2 . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
